data.name: The Trasamire Campaigns
data.detailed_description:
The King lies dying in his chamber. Once, he was a mighty conqueror. His army united a dozen warring city states, creating the great Kingdom of Trasamire.

His name is Unmorr, and he has left no heir. He rots in silken sheets, surrounded by onlookers from his court. You are one of them…

Take on the mantle of one of Trasamire's legendary founders and explore the story of their bid for the throne in this colorful strategy puzzler.

Features


  • Five intertwined stories shaped by interesting gameplay.
    • Branching narratives, compelling choices that always matter, and many endings.
    • Defeats don't end the game but introduce appropriate, and potentially deadly, consequences.
    • Chatty AI won't hide how they feel about you.
  • Relaxing strategy puzzling.
    • Deeply tactical: breakup formations, deny reinforcements, and pit enemies against each other.
    • Impactful Strategic and Story layers allow you to tailor your battles.
    • Play at your own pace. Achievable goals for any length sessions.
  • Try it!

data.short_description: The King is dead. The war for his Kingdom has begun. Take on the mantle of one of Trasamire's legendary founders and explore the story of their bid for the throne in this colorful strategy puzzler.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or later
  • Processor: 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
